name: raycast-zoxide
title: Zoxide
description: Raycast integration with the zoxide command-line tool by Ajeet D'Souza.
author: mrpunkin

commands.name: search-directories
commands.title: Search Directories
commands.subtitle: zoxide
commands.description: Search frequently used directories using zoxide.

commands.name: add-from-finder
commands.title: Add from Finder
commands.subtitle: zoxide
commands.description: Add the directory of the selected folder in Finder to zoxide. If there is no selection the directory of the open finder window will be used.

preferences.name: open-in
preferences.title: Open directories in
preferences.description: Choose the application to open directories with.

preferences.name: addl-paths
preferences.title: Additional path directories
preferences.description: Additional directories to prepend to the $PATH variable when using zoxide and other commands. Uses path syntax, e.g. `/usr/bin:/bin`.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
